channel.title: Another thread about the Steam ID box
channel.description:
It's stopped working for me...again.
It's been awhile since I was last here, so I dunno when it broke. Anyone know how to fix it?
Steam community ID number gives: Invalid community data. STEAM_ ID gives: Invalid community data. (I know it's not calibrated for that, but I thought I'd give it a try) I've no idea how to fetch the Steam-ID Number. Custom URL gives the right account name, but wrong avatar (one I haven't used in ages) and incorrectly states that I was online near 2-3 hours ago. I'm sat idling in Steam as I type this.
Or is this one of those problems that just randomly fixes itself over time? Either way, it would be nice to have my little account thingy back again. :frowning:
EDIT: Using Chrome, if that helps. Version 19.0.1084.56 m.

item.title: Another thread about the Steam ID box
item.dc:creator: Skilgannon
item.description:
sersoft:

To me it says: This user has not yet set up their Steam Community profile.

It’s what it says for me as well, which is wrong because I’ve been a member on Steam for a number of years now.

This is all so confusing.

Read full topic
item.source: Another thread about the Steam ID box

item.title: Another thread about the Steam ID box
item.dc:creator: Skilgannon
item.description:
Is it wrong to bump a thread 3 months old if you’re still having the same issue? No matter, it’s done.

Disregard OP. Problem is now: Community URL links right profile, but states I’m offline when I’m on.
STEAM_ID doesn’t work.
Other ID number doesn’t work.

Help a fellow scientist out?

Read full topic
